name: Pumpkin-Squash
keywords: acorn squash, pumpkin, fall, side dish, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 7 pounds pumpkin, cut in 4-by-5-inch pieces, or 5 acorn squash (1 1/4 pounds each), cut in half lengthwise, seeds and fibers removed
Freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pumpkin or squash in the water for 30 minutes. Scrape out flesh. It will instantly turn into a puree. Thoroughly drain through a fine-mesh sieve. Reserve liquid for another use. Transfer to an oval dish.
Whisk eggs into squash. Add remaining ingredients and whisk until combined well, scraping edges and bottom of dish.
Cover tightly with microwave-oven plastic wrap. Cook at 100 percent power in a 650- to 700-watt oven for 5 minutes. Prick plastic to release steam.
Uncover and stir well. Smooth mixture into an even layer. Cover and cook for 4 to 5 minutes. Prick plastic to release steam.
Remove from oven. Uncover. Cut into slices and serve warm.
